title: Chat disconnects!!
body:
Please help me i cannot connect to League of Legends chat.
My internet works completely fine and i have no other issue.
I can even que up but not see any of my friends! :(

replies.body: Earlier today a lot of players were having some problems getting signed in today, but we should have all that ironed out by now! Hit me back if you still can't seem to get logged in and I can take a closer look.
